title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Swarna Bandham" Collection
features: Contemporary Mangalsutra pendant featuring a three-strand design gracefully converging into a stylized floral motif. The diamonds are meticulously pavé-set, maximizing brilliance. The pendant boasts a sleek, minimalist aesthetic, making it easily wearable with various gold chains or traditional black bead strings (nalla pusala dandalu).
occasions: as an alternative to the traditional Mangalsutra for the modern woman.
description: This Mangalsutra pendant elegantly bridges tradition and modernity. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, the brilliant diamonds symbolize enduring love and commitment (Bandham). The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. Its versatile design allows it to be worn daily, expressing marital status with subtle sophistication.
